org.osgi.service.cdi.annotations

Annotation Type Service


  • @Target(value=TYPE)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Documented
public @interface Service
    The @Service annotation exposes a bean as an OSGi service.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      ServiceProperty[] properties
      Properties for the service.
      java.lang.Class<?>[] type
      The types under which to register the bean as a service.

    • Element Detail

      • type

        public abstract java.lang.Class<?>[] type
        The types under which to register the bean as a service.

        If not specified, the service types for this bean are all the directly implemented interfaces of the class being annotated.

        If the CDI bean does not directly implement any interfaces the bean class is used.

        Default:
        {}

      • properties

        public abstract ServiceProperty[] properties
        Properties for the service.

        Each property is specified as an instance of ServiceProperty.

        Default:
        {}
